scripts.gqlgen: cd services && (go run github.com/99designs/gqlgen@v0.17.84 generate || true) && go run ./tools/add_import.go
scripts.start:backend: cd services && go run -ldflags "-X main.Version=$(git describe --tags --always --dirty)" main.go
scripts.start:app: npm run sync:expo && cd expo && bunx expo start --clear
scripts.build:backend: cd services && CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags "-X main.Version=$(git describe --tags --always --dirty)" -o spark
scripts.build:docker: docker build --build-arg VERSION=$(git describe --tags --always --dirty) -f services/Dockerfile -t registry.prod.lyzn.in/spark:latest .
scripts.deploy:docker: docker push registry.prod.lyzn.in/spark:latest && kubectl apply -f deployment.yaml && kubectl rollout restart deployment spark
